title: Handle a Drop-Shipping Order
description: A retailer places an order that needs to be shipped directly to their end customer (drop-shipping).

tasks.description: Receive an order with a 'ship-to' address that is different from the retailer's 'bill-to' address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the order as a drop-shipment.

tasks.description: Generate a packing slip that shows the retailer's name and logo, not the wholesaler's.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a customized, private-label packing slip.

tasks.description: Process and ship the order directly to the end customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is fulfilled and shipped to the correct address.
